body_html: @ricvo The nonlinear gradients in Jacobian computation used in elu is usually much slower and the performance is not as good as relu most of the time. If you want to use elu, try to convert the input shape in your example and reduce the number of units to a much smaller number.
body_text: @ricvo The nonlinear gradients in Jacobian computation used in elu  is usually much slower and the performance is not as good as relu most of the time. If you want to use elu, try to convert the input shape in your example and reduce the number of units to a much smaller number.
body: @ricvo The nonlinear gradients in Jacobian computation used in `elu ` is usually much slower and the performance is not as good as `relu `most of the time. If you want to use `elu`, try to convert the input shape in your example and reduce the number of units to a much smaller number.
